description.value:
An anarchic rune is jagged and asymmetrical, channeling chaotic energy. A weapon with this rune deals an additional 1d6 spirit damage against lawful targets. If you are lawful, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} while carrying or wielding this weapon.

When you critically succeed at a Strike with this weapon against a lawful creature, roll 1d6. On a 1 or 2, you deal double minimum damage; on a 3 or 4, double your damage normally; on a 5 or 6, you deal double maximum damage.

Craft Requirements You are chaotic.
